title: Will this laptop be good for lol?
body: Hi so I am starting uni and need a laptop to study / play league. I just want a laptop that would run league at med - high specs at 60 fps. Would this laptop be good enough for this and is the price worth it for a laptop with the given specs? If not what would be a good laptop? Not willing to break $1100. http://www.ebay.com.au/itm/NEW-ASUS-F-X555LJ-i7-5500U-8GB-1TB-15-6-GeForce-GT920-Gaming-Laptop-Windows-10-/171953537734?hash=item28093ac2c6:g:hMsAAOSw14xWMbhB

replies.body:
Its specs are similar the the first computer i played league on, so i would say it should work fine. The main difference i see is its i7 while mine was i5

Note: The pc i used ran the game as 93 fps and 61 with V-sync
You might as well spend that money on a gaming pc..

I ran league back in the day on a piece of shit thing I picked up from Officeworks fro $400.

My computer with a GTX 750 Ti runs over 100 FPS on full graphics, $1100 is OVERKILL. You could spend like $600 on a decent laptop and get an external mouse, keyboard and monitor so you can play games better with the spare change.

Look at those laptops that have a docking station so you can setup your gaming in seconds, basically a portable desktop PC.
Easily.  League of legends is not a graphically intensive game, and you would probably be able to run it fairly smoothly on something for even half the price of this.
